Name: Mr.Egg:Adventure
About the game: One day, a devil spread the virus, an egg embark on a adventure to save the world, so he defeated all the enemy and wipe out the root of all virus.《Mr.X:Adventure》is a side-scrolling, adventure and action game, it features 32 stages, including 8 bosses. This mini game is made by only one student, hope that you will not stint your criticism.
